org.drip.measure.bayesian

Class TheilMixedEstimationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.bayesian.TheilMixedEstimationModel

  • public class TheilMixedEstimationModel
extends java.lang.Object
    TheilMixedEstimationModel implements the Theil's Mixed Model for the Estimation of the Distribution Parameters. The Reference is: - Theil, H. (1971): Principles of Econometrics, Wiley.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
